name: Click Me Clicks- Toddlers Tap
description: This little game will let your little one play on the screen and correlate tap to response. A soothing distracting game for your toddler, sparkling colors and soothing music, the baby can play by tapping the screen to pop up those cute faces, or leave the screen for automatic mode where spontaneous  colors and smiley faces will keep him engaged for few minutes.
